# The `UniqueVector` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/uniquevector">UniqueVector</a> - This class produces a sequential <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> number (base 1) for each unique entry that is added. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/uniquevector">UniqueVector</a> - This class produces a sequential <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> number (base 1) for each unique entry that is added.

T is the type of entries in the vector. This class should have an implementation of operator== and of operator&lt;. Entries can be fetched using operator&#91;&#93; with the entry <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.

Definition at line 24 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/uniquevector-h">UniqueVector.h</a>.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
insert - Append entry to the vector if it doesn&#39;t already exist.

Returns the entry&#39;s index + 1 to be used as a unique <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.
